name: Cook-Out
description:
Get Your Aprons Ready… Things Are About To Get Messy! The award-winning multiplayer VR cooking game from Resolution Games will soon sizzle on Steam.

Set within the cook’s cabin of a fairytale forest, Cook-Out: A Sandwich Tale is a wacky and whimsical adventure - brought to you by the creators of Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs, Bait! and Blaston - that challenges up to four players to work together to keep the orders coming for a hungry cast of enchanted creatures in this multiplayer VR game.

As players progress through increasingly hectic levels, they’ll not only prepare meals but will also need to fight off a number of nasty customers who seem absolutely set on making trouble -- like jesters who will hide parts of orders, or thieves who will keep pilfering ingredients.

While the game is focused on cooperative play, solo players will be able to enjoy the experience with the help of a simulated partner, making sure there’s always a team to tackle tough orders and restore the calm to this wild kitchen.
